Prepare auth0-lock CSS

Instructions:

  1. Update the auth0-lock version in the script tag below if needed
  2. Serve this directory with: python -m http.server 8000
  3. Open this page in a browser: http://localhost:8000/prepare-css.html
  4. Click "Prepare CSS" button below
  5. Click "Copy to Clipboard" to copy the complete CSS
  6. Save the clipboard content to auth0-lock.min.css

Note: The CSS includes the --vh fallback automatically appended for CSP compliance.
